casebody.data:
No. 10-1249. Richard A. Tropp, Petitioner v. The Corporation of Lloyd’s. 564 U.S. 1046, 131 S. Ct. 3064,

180 L. Ed. 2d 903,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 4826. June 27, 2011.

Petition for writ of cer-tiorari to the United States Court of *904Appeals for the Second Circuit denied.

Justice Sotomayor took no part in the consideration or decision of this petition.

Same case below, 385 Fed. Appx. 36.
